paper_keywords: System of linear Fredholm integral equations
paper_abstract: In this paper, we present a modification to homotopy perturbation method for solving system of linear Fredholm integral equations (LFIEs). Some examples are given, revealing its effectiveness and convenience. Also the results obtained by modified homoperturbation method (MHPM) is superior to that obtained by Adomian decomposition method (ADM). (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Modified homotopy perturbation method for solving system of linear Fredholm integral equations
